message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's a unique opportunity that aligns perfectly with your needs and expectations. We're confident it will bring significant value to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $1200000 for this exceptional item.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value your product brings. I am willing to pay $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we believe we can reach an agreement that benefits both parties. We would like to propose a price of $1075000 for our premium product. This reflects the value it provides and allows us to maintain a competitive edge in the market.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $1000000 for it.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. We understand your position and are willing to meet you halfway. Our counteroffer is $1050000 for the product. We believe this price reflects the value it holds and is fair for both parties involved.
